summary: The module implements support for analyzing CircleCI pipeline configurations in the Checkov security scanner. It provides a common abstract base for parsing and validating pipeline files and a runner that loads resources, validates workflows, processes external checks, and generates compliance reports.
business_intent: To enable automated security and compliance assessment of CircleCI pipeline definitions, helping organizations detect misconfigurations and policy violations in their CI/CD workflows as part of infrastructure-as-code scanning.
